main event: A ball-shaped object was observed traveling at extremely high speed over Midway Island on 25 June 1960.
interesting points: The object separated into two pieces just prior to burnout., It held under visual observation for 5-8 seconds., The pilots noted it was not like any shooting star they had previously seen., The object was greenish-yellow and left an impression of a trail across the sky., The sighting corresponds with previous fireball sightings.
